newsitem.title: USA: Applied Communications in marketing pact.
newsitem.headline: Applied Communications in marketing pact.

text.p: Transaction Systems Architects Inc's Applied Communications Inc said Tuesday it and Global Payment Systems signed a joint marketing agreement to provide software solutions to banks.
The pact applies to markets in Europe, the Middle East and Africa, the companies said. The companies may agree to market products jointly in other regions according to business needs.
Both companies have a number of mutual customers and have worked together in the past as Tandem Alliance Partners, they said.

Global Payment Systems specializes in corporate payment and information systems, it said. The company, based in Peterborough, England, is the new partnership venture of National Data Corp and MasterCard International and includes the operations and staff of NDC International Ltd.
Applied Communications is a supplier of electronic payments solutions for major banks.
